snippet.title: Martha Is Dead Announcement Teaser
snippet.description:
Subscribe now by clicking http://bit.ly/WIREDsub

Add to Steam wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/515960/Martha_is_dead/

Visit the Wired webpage: https://www.wiredproductions.com/martha-is-dead

From the creator of The Town of Light, Martha is Dead is a first-person dark psychological thriller, combining disturbing and dreamlike tones with a mix of history, superstition and psychological distress.

Tuscany, 1944, south of the Gothic line. As conflict intensifies between German and Allied forces, the desecrated body of a woman is found drowned. Her twin sister, the young daughter of a German soldier, must alone deal with the acute trauma of loss, while the truth of the brutal murder is shrouded by mysterious folklore and the extreme horror of war which draws ever closer.

Martha is Dead © 2019 LKA. All Rights Reserved. Published by Wired Productions.
